root.name: Crash Time 4: The Syndicate
root.description: Crash Time 4: The Syndicate was released in Germany (as Alarm for Cobra 11) on November 29 2010. This is the first title in the franchise, to feature online multiplayer. On PC, the game uses the Games for Windows - LIVE client for its online with an identical achievement set as the Xbox 360 version. Â A demo with online play was released on Xbox LIVE Marketplace on January 11, 2011. The retail game is expected to come to other European regions (including UK) in February.
